title: GTA Online
headline: GTA Online
subtitle: Bail Office: Hunt, Catch, Earn
content:
Once Maude Eccles makes contact, youâ€™ll be able to buy a Bail Office from Maze Bank Foreclosures and start your own bounty-hunting business. The Bail Office has everything you need, from the holding cell to a garage for your new Transporter.

Get details on your targets from the Bail Enforcement System and start hunting. Secure your targets alive and put them behind bars to earn the most cash. Neutralizing them will earn you significantly less money.
